author: markrmiller
msg: Fix duplicate code and one version of getWeightedSpanTerms - should accept a TokenStream now rather than a CachingTokenStream.
Also fixes getWeightedSpanTermsWithScores to intern the fieldname.

msg: continuous replication request returns 202 Accepted and the _local docid
